resources.string: "Εμφάνισε αυτό το πορτοφόλι στη συνολική καταμέτρηση"
"Αυτή η κατηγορία δεν συμπεριλαμβάνεται στις αναφορές"
"Πρεέπει να είναι αριθμός μεταξύ του 0 και 8"
"Τα πορτοφόλια πρέπει να έχουν το ίδιο νόμισμα"
"Η εφαρμογή μπορεί να δημιουργήσει και να επανακτήσει τα αντίγραφα κατευθείαν από την εξωτερική μνήμη της συσκευής."
"Η εφαρμογή μπορεί να δημιουργήσει και να επανακτήσει τα αντίγραφα από το προσωπικό σας λογαριασμό Dropbox."
"Η εφαρμογή μπορεί να δημιουργήσει και να επανακτήσει τα αντίγραφα από το προσωπικό σας λογαριασμό Google Drive."
"Επέλεξε ένα στοιχείο από τα αριστερά για να δεις λεπτομέρειες"
"Επέλεξε την υπηρεσία που θες να χρησιμοποιήσεις για αποθήκευση και επαναφορά των προσωπικών σου αντιγράφων"

"The amounts in the database must be updated in order to match the new number of decimal digits. The operation may take some time. If you want you can skip the update but the amounts will be displayed as divided by %d after the change."

"The amounts in the database must be updated in order to match the new number of decimal digits. The operation may take some time. If you want you can skip the update but the amounts will be displayed as multiplied by %d after the change. If the amounts are updated, some information about their current fractional part will be lost."
"Insert the name of the folder that you want to create"
"The permission to access the external storage is required in order to read and write files. Please enable it."
"Permission denied. Please go to application setting and enable it."
"Are you sure you want create a new backup? The operation cannot be stopped. If you want you can set a password to protect the backup file."
"Are you sure you want to restore this backup? All current data will be lost and the operation cannot be stopped. Proceed?"
"Are you sure you want to restore this backup? All current data will be lost and the operation cannot be stopped. The backup is protected by a password, please enter it and proceed."

"Are you sure you want to restore this backup? All current data will be lost and the operation cannot be stopped. WARNING!: this is a legacy backup and the application may fail to import it. Proceed?"
"Failure during the creation of the backup. Message: %s"
"Failure during the restoring of the backup. Message: %s"
"Are you sure you want to disconnect your Dropbox account?"
"Are you sure you want to disconnect your Google Drive account?"
"Are you sure you want to archive this wallet? It will not be visible in the menu anymore."
"Are you sure you want to unarchive this wallet? It will be visible in the menu again."
"Are you sure you want to archive this debt?"
"Are you sure you want to unarchive this debt?"
"Are you sure you want to archive this saving?"
"Are you sure you want to unarchive this saving?"
"No application found on this device to handle the request."
"Are you sure you want to delete this currency?"
"This currency cannot be deleted because it is in use."
"Are you sure you want to delete this wallet? All the related data will be removed."
"This wallet cannot be deleted because is used in one or more transfers. Please remove the related transfers to delete this wallet."
"Are you sure you want to delete this category?"
"Nested child categories are not supported: the selected parent category is already a child of another category."
"The selected parent category is not of the same type of this category."
"Nested child categories are not supported: this category has one or more children and cannot be updated as child category."
"The selected parent category is not of the same type of this category."
"This category cannot be deleted because it has one or more children. Please remove them before."
"This category cannot be deleted because it is in use. Please remove any references to this category and retry."
"This category cannot be deleted because it is a system category."
"Are you sure you want to delete this transaction?"
"Are you sure you want to delete this transfer?"
"This transaction cannot be deleted because is part of a transfer. Please remove the related transfer to delete this transaction."
"Are you sure you want to delete this debt? All the related data will be removed."
"Are you sure you want to delete this budget?"
"Are you sure you want to delete this saving? All the related data will be removed."
"Are you sure you want to delete this event?"
"Are you sure you want to delete this transaction model?"
"Are you sure you want to delete this transfer model?"
"Are you sure you want to delete this recurrent transaction? All the already generated transactions will not be removed."
"Are you sure you want to delete this recurrent transfer? All the already generated transfers will not be removed."
"Are you sure you want to delete this place?"
"Are you sure you want to delete this person?"
"Do you want to add a master transaction for this debt?"

"An error has occurred while upgrading the internal database. Please, be patient and notify this message to the developer. Do not uninstall the application or you will lose your data. You will be redirected to the application to check if something got corrupted. Error message: %s"
"This is a feature that could fail and mess up your data, make sure you've backed up your existing data before continuing. Do you want to proceed anyway?"
"Data exported correctly. Do you want to open the created file?"

"This service requires a valid api-key in order to work. This means that this application release was compiled without a default key, probably due to licensing issues. To be able to communicate with this external provider you must go to https://openexchangerates.org and register: you will receive a free key."
"The operation has been programmed to be performed only when the device is connected to a WiFi network. Connect to a WiFi network and try again."
"There was an error while communicating with the backend service. Check your internet connection and try again."
"There was an error with the backend and the auto backup has been disabled. Check if there is any problem."
"There was an internal error during the operation, which is probably a bug. Please report this message to the developer: %s"
"missing or invalid api key, please update the api key in settings in order to use this service"
"Is it the first time you use this application or do you want to restore a previous backup?"
"It will help you track all your expenses"
"You can analyze where you spend a lot and setup some budget"
"The project is now open source and everyone can contribute"
"It support the most used cloud services to help you never lose your data"
"You will now be redirected to create your first wallet"
"Code mismatch, create a new pin code"
"If you like this application and you find it useful, consider buying me a beer. It will support this project and encourage me to keep it in development."

"Someone might say, “The best things in life are free” and I agree with it. You can not buy friendship, love or a memory of a beautiful sunrise. That's why I decided to share the source code of this application for free. But unfortunately, life is not free. You have only 24 hours every day of scarce time and you have to make decisions how to spend them to support yourself. If you like this project and you want to see it evolving in future, think about supporting my work to allow me to allocate more time on it. Any contribution makes an immense difference."
"Can not contribute monetary? No problem, you can still help a lot!"
"Write a 5 start review telling us what you think about it"
"The source code is public and everyone can collaborate"
"Every contribution, monetary or non-monetary, is equal and make substantial difference for me. Hope you enjoy it and thanks again for choosing to use this application."
